providers.address: Service territory across DC, Northern Virginia, and Maryland
providers.description: Provides no-cost energy efficiency upgrades for income-qualified Washington Gas customers, including weatherization measures and high-efficiency natural gas equipment to reduce energy use and monthly bills.
providers.eligibility: Income-qualified Washington Gas residential customers; eligibility typically based on household income at or below program thresholds or participation in qualifying assistance programs
